requestBody.title: Landing Page
requestBody.description: A summary of an individual page's properties.

name.title: Landing Page Name
name.description: The name of this landing page.

title.title: Landing Page title
title.description: The title of this landing page seen in the browser's title bar.

description.title: Landing Page description
description.description: The description of this landing page.

store_id.title: Store ID
store_id.description: The ID of the store associated with this landing page.

list_id.title: Landing Page list id
list_id.description: The list's ID associated with this landing page.

tracking.title: Tracking Settings
tracking.description: The tracking settings applied to this landing page.

track_with_mailchimp.title: Track with Mailchimp
track_with_mailchimp.description: Use cookies to track unique visitors and calculate overall conversion rate. Learn more [here](https://mailchimp.com/help/use-track-mailchimp/).

enable_restricted_data_processing.title: Enable restricted data processing
enable_restricted_data_processing.description: Google offers restricted data processing in connection with the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) to restrict how Google uses certain identifiers and other data processed in the provision of its services. You can learn more about Google's restricted data processing within Google Ads [here](https://privacy.google.com/businesses/rdp/).
